title: データ解析 プレイングマネージャー
description: Job Description未経験可【データ解析（プレイングマネージャー）】急募！東証にも上場している自然言語処理に特化したデータ解析企業で、データ解析（プレイングマネージャー）を募集これからデータサイエンティストを目指したい方にもお勧めのポジションです。自社開発の AI エンジンを用いて、ライフサイエンス分野、ビジネスソリューション分野、リーガルテック分野など、様々なフィールドにおける社会課題の解決に貢献している会社です！！ 取引先企業は、大企業が大多数を占めます。本ポジションについて ；自然言語処理に特化した AI を駆使し、クライアントよりお預かりした社内データの解析をお任せいたします。（主に学習モデル作成・テスト・レポーティングまでを担当）。解析手法の検討や技術的なマネジメントのみならず、約 10 名の解析チームメンバーをまとめ、中期的なチームビルディング／技術面におけるメンバーの育成もミッションとなります。業務内容 ；入社後は自社アルゴリズム／自社解析ツールへの理解を深めることを目的にデータサイエンティストとして様々な案件に参加いただき、現場にて解析実務に従事いただきます。その後、案件に携わりつつ、徐々にチームマネジメントもお任せしていく想定です。割合的には、プレイヤーとしての業務が全体の約7割、マネジメント業務が全体の約3割となります。＜解析実務＞顧客の実データを元に、弊社独自アルゴリズム及びオープンソース機械学習アルゴリズムを兼ね合わせた解決手法の検討および解析実務を行っていただきます。主には学習モデル作成からのテスト、レポーティングまでを責任もって対応し、PoC 成功および本導入の鍵を握る重要な役割を担います。＜マネジメント実務（実務を経験し、徐々にアサインを想定）＞データ解析案件の解析手法、使用技術へのアドバイスなど含むメンバーマネジメント（10 名未満）の対応、また中期的なチームビルディングを視野にした技術面におけるメンバー育成にも注力いただきたいです。遅滞無く臨機応変に案件対応ができる解析チームの組織体制確⽴・運用を推進いただきます。必須条件；■データ解析に関する案件対応経験 3 年以上、もしくは、BtoBシステムアプリケーション開発経験 3 年以上■コンピュータサイエンスに関する基本的な知識を有していること （実業務経験がなくても可。）■マネジメント経験ポジションの魅力；＜AI を活用できる人材に＞自社開発 AIエンジンを活用した社会課題解決へ携わることを通して、⼈⼯知能と⼈間との協業経験を積み、⼈⼯知能を活用できる⼈材へ成⻑することができます。＜将来的にプロダクト開発にも携われる＞当社の研究・開発部⾨である行動情報科学研究所のプロダクトマーケティング・研究・開発⼈員と協業し、新しいアルゴリズムのアイデア出しやビジネス開発、及びプロダクトの開発にも関わることが可能です。求める人物像；全体を俯瞰して進捗管理を行い、クライアントファーストでチームリードできる方。１．技術面だけに着目するのではなく、ビジネス面（会社の成⻑）への貢献を意識して仕事ができる方２．新⼈や若手に対しても真摯且つ対等に向きあい、話をしっかり聞ける度量を持っている方４．自律的に高い目標を設定し、達成に向けて能動的に当事者意識を持って行動できる方５．できない理由を探すのではなく、できる方法を常に考え簡単にはあきらめない方６．整っていない環境を苦にせず、自分で環境を整える事も含めて業務と捉えて仕事ができる方

title: Data Engineer (P3) - Data Engineering(データ本部)
description: 職務内容Job DescriptionJob description Design and Modeling Build the first iterations of high quality and sustainable data pipelines and ETL processes to extract data from a variety of APIs and relational databases and ingest into AWS services. Efficiently develop complex SQL queries and data models to aggregate and transform data for reporting and analytics teams.Execution And Maintenance Monitor existing solutions and work proactively to rapidly resolve errors and identify future problems before they occur. Own and keep the system design and operations documents up to date.Communicate Consult with a variety of stakeholders to gather new project requirements and transform these into well-defined tasks and targets.設計とデータのモデリング: 品質が高く安定稼働するデータ・パイプラインやELTプロセスを開発し、様々なAPIやリレーショナル・データベースからデータを抽出してAWS環境に取込む保守運用活動の実施: 現行システムを監視して問題が起きれば迅速に解決し、将来、その問題が起こる事を積極的に防止する システム設計書やシステム運用資料を最新の状態に保つコミュニケーション: 様々な関係者と相談し、新規プロジェクトの要件を集め、タスクやプロジェクトの目標に落とし込む

title: Customer Engineer, Data Specialist, Enterprise (Data Application Focus)
description: Google welcomes people with disabilities.Minimum qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.4 years of experience in customer facing role (e.g., pre-sales engineer, consultant, professional services).Experience in data and information management as it relates to Business Intelligence Application (Tableau, Microstrategy, PowerBI), Data Processing (Informatica, Talend), or Data Analytics Platform (Hadoop/Spark, Netezza, Teradata)Preferred qualifications:Master's degree in Computer Science or related technical field, or experience with Big Data, PaaS, and IaaS technologies.Application development and integration experience. Software development platforms and solutions experience in J2EE, Java servlets, Python, Go or AJAX.Experience supporting high touch sales for enterprise as pre-sales engineer for wide portfolio of data lifecycle.Experience discussing the value of machine learning with customer.About The JobThe Google Cloud Platform team helps customers transform and build what's next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. Our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life. As part of an entrepreneurial team in this rapidly growing business, you will play a key role in understanding the needs of our customers and help shape the future of businesses of all sizes use technology to connect with customers, employees and partners.In this role, you will work with sales teams as a data analytics solutions subject matter expert to differentiate and paint the vision of Google Cloud to our customers. You will help prospective customers and partners understand the power of Google Cloud with translating technical value to business value, explaining technical features, helping customers design architectures, engage in proof of concepts, and troubleshoot potential roadblocks related to analytics workloads & projects. You will craft the vision to transform customer business with the power of data, using Google Cloud’s unique technology, such as BigQuery, Cloud Dataflow, Data Catalog etc.Google Cloud provides organizations with leading infrastructure, platform capabilities and industry solutions. We deliver enterprise-grade cloud solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology to help companies operate more efficiently and adapt to changing needs, giving customers a foundation for the future. Customers in more than 150 countries turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to solve their most critical business problems.ResponsibilitiesBuild a trusted advisory relationship with our customers, identify customer priorities, discover the needs of data powered innovation, create the story to transform customer’s business with using data, technical objections and design strategies encompassing Google Cloud’s Data solutions to deliver business value and resolve blockers.Support sales teams who help enterprise customers digitalize with Google Cloud by supporting bid response, product and solution briefing, proof-of-concept work, and the coordination of regional partners. Especially focusing on translating technical value to business value. Make recommendations on integration strategies, enterprise architectures, platforms and application infrastructure required to successfully implement a complete solution providing best practice advice to customers and partners to optimize Google Cloud effectiveness.Drive consumption for Google Cloud’s data products primarily for Analytics, but also Machine Learning and databases with value-based discovery for our customers. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

title: System Engineer
employment_type: Information Technology, Engineering, and Project Management
description: Our client, which specialises in IT engineering solutions and services, is hiring for a variety of development and infrastructure related positions.They are proactively adopting new technologies such as AI and IaaC/NoCode. They continue to stay at the leading edge of technology through their research and discussions on technology as part of club activities. Our client also has a large number of non-Japanese staff, making for a very multinational working environment.■We are looking for the following positions#SystemEngineer#SoftwareEngineer#NetworkEngineer#Databaseadministrator#InfrastructureEngineer#SAPEngineer#RPAEngineer#Projectmanager#BridgeSE※Based on our discussion, there may be other opportunities that we can recommend to you.■SalaryAnnual salary: 4-10 million※Salary is negotiable, and it will depend on your skills and experience.■Employment StatusRegular employee■Selection ProcessDocument screening2 interviews (online available)■Language SkillsJapanese Language Proficiency Test N2 or higherProficiency in other languages are welcome■LocationTokyo弊社取扱のIT企業では、システムエンジニアを募集しております。同社では、ノーコードでの企業内の業務プロセスの構築・運用を実現しました。ほかにも、AI技術を活用した文章要約など、各種ツールを展開しています。AIなどの新技術を積極的に取り入れており、部活動としても技術に関する研究や議論を行っているのが特徴です。また外国籍スタッフも多く、風通しの良い環境です。日本語レベルはN2以上の方を募集しております。【募集ポジション】システムエンジニアソフトウェアエンジニアデータベース管理者インフラエンジニアSAPエンジニアRPAエンジニアプロジェクトマネージャーブリッジSEその他エンジニアもご相談ください【給与】400-1000万スキル・ご経験によって考慮します【選考プロセス】書類選考面接2回（オンライン可）【勤務地】東京都【言語レベル】日本語スキルN2以上〜

title: データサイエンティスト
description: 【仕事内容】・日本/世界の大企業が抱える多様な経営課題を高度なアナリティクスを用いて解決し、企業変革を支援する・戦略コンサルタント、データエンジニア等の多様な専門家とコラボレーションして事業価値を創造する・政府・官公庁へのデータ活用政策の提言・実現支援を通じ社会へ貢献する【求める人材】・プログラミング言語（R、Python等）を用いた機械学習や統計モデリングの経験をお持ちの方【語学力】不要【学歴】大学卒以上【給与】【年収】600万円～1,800万円【月給】30万円～90万円【賞与】年2回【勤務地】神奈川県横浜市西区みなとみらい4-4-1 横浜野村ビルもしくは東京都千代田区大手町1-9-2 大手町グランキューブ【勤務時間】9:00～18:00 裁量労働制（専門業務型、企画業務型）１日のみなし労働時間９時間10分、休憩時間60分【雇用・契約形態】【待遇・福利厚生】【保険】健康保険、厚生年金、労災、雇用保険【待遇・福利厚生】退職金、住宅手当、寮・社宅、資格支援制度、研修制度、 従業員持株制度、財形貯蓄、資格取得支援、派遣留学制度（国内・国外）、テレワーク制度、保養所 など【通勤交通費】全額支給【休日・休暇】【休日】土、日、祝日【年間休日】120日【休暇】夏季休暇、年末年始休暇、育児休暇、介護休暇、慶弔休暇、有給休暇 など

title: Market Data & Middleware Engineer
description: ResponsibilitiesDesign, implement, support and administer Market Data infrastructures to provide reliable and cost effective market data services for the bank in Asia Pacific region.Ensure Market Data services being offered are in line with business requirement in conjunction with global standard and practice.Follow, propose and implement the necessary technical evolutions to the Market Data infrastructures maintaining a stable production environment at optimal cost.Capacity planning to ensure the various components in the IT infrastructure are capable to effectively support the business activities at optimal cost.Interface with service providers, business functions and IT functions regarding middleware services and solutions.Provide documentation for “Follow-the-Sun” support, as well as knowledge sharing across our team globally.Profile requiredHolds a relevant Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information System or similar3-5 years experience in the banking industryGood communication skillsGood knowledge of Market Data content and services (Reuters, Bloomberg)Good knowledge of Market Data desktops solutions (EIKON, Bloomberg, FXT, EBS)Sound knowledge of middleware content and services (Tibco RV, IUM)Sound knowledge of monitoring platform (ITRS)Knowledge of programming language would be a bonus (Python)Experienced with Agile frameworks, feature teams organizations (scrum, product ownership...)Able to work with a remote team, to drive local/regional projects and support, including China and IndiaBusiness insightCompany DescriptionSociete Generale is one of the leading European financial services groups. Founded in 1864, we have been playing a vital role in the economy for over 150 years. With more than 133,000 employees based in 61 countries worldwide, we accompany 32 million clients throughout the world on a daily basis. Based on a diversified universal banking model, the Group combines financial strength with a strategy of sustainable growth.ASIA-PACIFIC (ASIA), as one of the Business Units of Societe Generale, operates in 12 locations across the Asia Pacific region, employing over 2,500 employees with the regional headquarter located in Hong Kong. Our activities here are centered on Societe Generale's Global Banking & Investor Solutions pole (GBIS), a major growth engine for the Group and a key pillar of Societe Generale's universal banking model. Our expertise in Asia Pacific ranges from Corporate & Investment Banking (Advisory, Financing and Global Markets) to Asset Management, Global Transaction Banking and specialised financial services like Equipment & Vendor Finance and Vehicle Leasing & Fleet Management. In addition, Societe Generale's Global Solution Centre (SGGSC) in Bangalore and Chennai offers customised business solutions to the Societe Generale Group globally including ASIA.Department DescriptionWelcome to the IT Infrastructure department, Global Technology Services (GTS)..IT infrastructure is one of the major stakes for the bank and is at the heart of Societe Generale group's strategy.Today, the Digital Transformation raises important challenges around IT Architecture, Infrastructure and Security. Many of these challenges are opportunities to imagine new experiences for our clients and new way to deliver IT services.Within the Resources and Innovation division, GTS department plays a key role in the Digital Transformation. With more than 3500 GTS staff located across the world, GTS develops innovative projects while delivering operational excellence for infrastructure services to 148,000 employees and 32 million external clients.At GTS Asia, we are one of the pioneers in agile practice.

title: Business Operations - Data & Analytics Lead
description: The Data & Analytics Lead will leading the development of best-in-class Analytics and Analytics Capabilities, in close cooperation with Commercial Heads and the Info & Technology organization・ The Data & Analytics Lead will be responsible for generating analytics and dashboards to support the commercial teams in better understanding our customers and in making critical business decisions.・ As "Company" embeds Veeva CRM ops and C360 approach in all customer facing processes, dashboard and analytics insights are key to better understanding our execution and our customers. C360 CRM is a Global system (Veeva) now in Go Live status. The Data& Analytics Lead will be responsible to work closely with the C360 Specialist and other commercial leaders to ensure analytics around CRM (Veeva), market, business performance analytics are generated. It will include governance, integration and maintenance of other key commercial data systems/digital toolsThe Data & Analyst Lead Will・ Collaborate with IT to compete integration of Veeva CRM Data, secondary syndicated sales data (e.g., Encise), internal financial data, and other relevant data sources into dashboard and reporting system (Tableau, ClickSense,..)・ Continuously evaluate new data sources, compare robustness and coverage with current data sources, and pro-actively suggest new data sources to business stakeholders as necessary・ Continuously evaluate so that data management structure provides data in readily usable format to business stakeholders; pro-actively suggest modifications to data management structure as necessary・ Respond to ad-hoc inquiries from business stakeholders on data contents, data interpretation, etc..・ Work with Asia/Pac and Global to understand future data tool and technology roadmap within "Company", provide necessary input for Japan customization, and ensure smooth rollout in Japan.・ Co-lead with CE team, I&Tteams to provide direction on commercial da【求められる経験・スキル / Required Experience And Skills】5+ Experience in Pharma industry or life science・ 3+ years of work experience covering similar subject matter areas (KPIs, dashboards, reporting), either for a life science manufacturer or consulting company・ Prior experience driving alignment around technology roadmaps, developing business cases for new technologies and data sources, is desired but not required・ Prior experience facilitating decision-making among senior management to drive business results is desired・ Prior experience partnering with IT personnel to ensure acceptability of data environment for business purpose is desired・ Prior experience managing vendors and suppliers・ Experience in relevant therapeutic areas (e.g., rare disease, hematology, immunology) is a plus・ Strong analytical capabilities, at ease with working with data and can draw insights through presenting it.・ Facilitation skills, planning & project management skills to drive change・ Self-starter, drive, eager to drive effective change to improve outcome working collaborativelyTechnical Expertise・ Familiarity with more data analytic techniques (e.g., descriptive data summary techniques, multivariate regression techniques, time series projection techniques)・ Familiarity with data processing techniques to cleanse and manipulate large volumes of data (e.g., daily promotional activity data, data account-level sales data, etc..)・ Familiarity with advanced analytical techniques (e.g., machine learning) is helpful・ Prior experience with life-science specific data sources (e.g., secondary demand data from IQVIA, Encise, etc., CRM data, internally tracked activity data and financial sales data)・ Prior experience with Veeva CRM and QlickSense is helpful・ Expert-user of tools and technologies to complete above tasks (Excel, Access, SAS / SQL / Other data title: データサイエンティスト＜自動駐車、おもてなしサービス等＞
description: 【仕事内容】■CASE領域において、市場価値の高い製品・サービスを開発するためのAIを含む技術開発を担当していただきます。直近商用化する予定のものから、将来に向けての技術開発まで、様々な時間軸のプロジェクトが並行して走っています。以下いずれかのグループへの配属となります。・インカーグループ：車体領域への技術提供（車室内監視システムと連携した機能開発）・アウトカーグループ：走行領域への技術提供（走行制御システムと連携した機能開発）【具体的には】商品開発部門と協業し、以下のようなプロジェクトを担当いただきます。・「自動運転時代の新サービス：おもてなし」プロジェクト…AIを活用して車室内外の人の状態推定を行うことで、より快適な乗車を提供するシステムの研究・開発・「物体検知アルゴリズム開発」プロジェクト…自動運転に必要なディープラーニングを活用した高精度かつ軽量な物体検知モデルの開発・「自動緊急ブレーキ開発」プロジェクト…車両周辺の対象物(歩行者など)の正確な位置、移動方向・速度、行動などを把握するために必要な技術の開発・「自動バレー駐車開発」プロジェクト…ス...【求める人材】【必須要件】機械学習の知識を活用し、自ら課題解決をされたご経験【歓迎要件】・画像認識・画像処理・画像生成に関する知識・Deep learningのモデル構築～実装経験・センサー情報や時系列データを扱ったご経験【給与】450-1000万円【勤務地】愛知県【勤務時間】08:30 - 17:30（コアタイム：00:00 - 00:00）【雇用・契約形態】【待遇・福利厚生】健康保険、雇用保険、労災保険、厚生年金通勤手当、家賃補助（入居条件有）、家族手当寮社宅、持ち株会制度、財形貯蓄、社員食堂、個人年金など（従業員拠出）への補助、その他制度 保養所、会員制リゾート、契約スポーツ施設、社内託児所、確定拠出年金、アイシン企業年金基金、服装自由、在宅勤務可能、短時間勤務可能【休日・休暇】年間121日／（内訳）完全週休2日制（土・日）、春季休暇、夏期休暇、年末年始、有給休暇、慶弔休暇、リフレッシュ休暇、介護休暇、産休育休

title: Systems Engineer / Analyst – Asset Management
description: Job Reference #244659BRJob TypeFull TimeYour roleDo you want to apply your core technical skills and knowledge to the financial services domain? Are you interested in building and enhancing software, systems and data architecture to better power key business processes?We’re looking for a junior to mid-level systems engineer/analyst to: develop subject matter expertise in our applications and data, and how they are used collaborate with colleagues in innovating business processes and data architectures decompose business problems and requirements into clear and unambiguous user stories ensure solutions meet control and risk requirements, in line with policies and standards maintain a strong technical focus and contribute throughout the software development life cycle contribute to the team’s agile culture as UBS introduces new ways of workingYour teamWorking in the Chief Digital and Information Office, you’ll be an integral part of a pod aligned to Asset Management Japan. Technology is a game-changer and we are here to help the business grow, developing products for the location that dovetail with the global application and data architecture. Our pod maintains a suite of legacy applications, but you’ll play an important role in building out next-generation applications and reducing technical debt. We want to deliver better products, smarter.Your expertise Ideally 3+ years of experience in application or information system delivery teams using agile practices solid understanding of the software development lifecycle some background in application development and scripting relational database, data modelling and data exploration skills strong problem solving, logical thinking, communication and documentation abilities inquisitive, able to challenge effectively and manage conflicting stakeholder needs comfortable working in ambiguous situations to derive well-defined outcomes university degree with a focus on computer science, mathematics, finance, data science or related excellent English communication skills, with business fluency in Japanese desirablePractical knowledge or experience with the following will also be helpful in your new environment: UX and UI design microservice architectures and APIs messaging technologies containers and container orchestration NoSQL data stores cloud platforms and cloud-native services financial markets, products and servicesAbout UsUBS is the world’s largest and only truly global wealth manager. We operate through four business divisions: Global Wealth Management, Personal & Corporate Banking, Asset Management and the Investment Bank. Our global reach and the breadth of our expertise set us apart from our competitors.With more than 70,000 employees, we have a presence in all major financial centers in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?How We HireThis role requires an assessment on application. Learn more about how we hire: www.ubs.com/global/en/careers/experienced-professionals.htmlJoin usAt UBS, we embrace flexible ways of working when the role permits. We offer different working arrangements like part-time, job-sharing and hybrid (office and home) working. Our purpose-led culture and global infrastructure help us connect, collaborate, and work together in agile ways to meet all our business needs.From gaining new experiences in different roles to acquiring fresh knowledge and skills, we know that great work is never done alone. We know that it's our people, with their unique backgrounds, skills, experience levels and interests, who drive our ongoing success. Together we’re more than ourselves. Ready to be part of #teamUBS and make an impact?Disclaimer / Policy StatementsUBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.

title: 【DS】データサイエンティスト
description: 【Key Tasks & Accountabilities／職務内容】1）新規見込み客のプロファイリングによるメディア別キャンペーン・データ分析・モデル構築＆既存契約者のプロファリングによる継続勧奨施策のモデル構築2）TNPS及びRNPS改善へ向けたデータ分析及び施策提案3）オペレーション・モデルの効率化・最適化4）クロスセル施策による販売促進のための分析と施策提案【Relationships／主な関係先】社内：ダイレクト事業本部、ホールセール事業本部、損害サービス部門、管理関連部門等社外：アナリティクスベンダー、調査会社等【Qualifications / Experience 必要知識、経験等】1）確率、統計、情報理論の知識2）統計ソフトウェア（SAS, R, Python）3）統計データ収集、分析、モデリング（時系列分析、一般化線形モデル、機械学習など）の７年以上の実務経験があることが望ましい データ整備・加工(SQL)の経験5）英語によるコミュニケーション能力を重視＊外国籍の方、日本語以外を母語とされる方には、ネイティブレベルの日本語力を求めます。＊日本語のresumeを必ず提出ください。

title: Data Platform Engineer, EC Business Data Analytics & Platform Section (Fukuoka Office) - Commerce Company Business Support Development Department(CCBD)
description: Job DescriptionBusiness OverviewThe Marketplace business is the development of Rakuten Ichiba, the founding business of Rakuten.Rakuten Ichiba, founded in 1997 and continuing to this day, embodies Rakuten's mission of ""empowering people and society through innovation,"" and has created a system that allows people who are good at business to easily open stores beyond the limits of the business sphere, delivering the joy of shopping to users throughout Japan. We are now one of the largest EC companies in Japan.Rakuten Ichiba service pagehttps://www.rakuten.co.jp/Department OverviewCommerce Company Business Support Development Department is in charge of some of the Merchant services provided by Rakuten and various in-house applications to support business staff to operate Rakuten Ichiba in Japan and overseas. EC Business Data Analytics & Platform Section promotes data utilization based on the huge transaction data of Rakuten Ichiba (number of stores : 50,000, number of products: 300 million, annual sales: over 3 trillion yen) . We build a data platform to support business decision-making.Data Platform Engineer team are developing and operating data platform to utilize enormous traffic data for supporting and enhancing the business.PositionWhy We HireRakuten Ichiba and related businesses own huge and variety of data. It is very important to build a system to utilize such data safety and easily for business. In this challenge, Data Platform engineer needs to introduce technology and keep improving system to let business utilize data efficiently for maximizing business value. In this job, we are finding person who will improve and innovate this system together.Position DetailsBasic Position DetailsBuild and operate platform with Hadoop eco systemBuild and operate data pipeline and processing systemResearch, introduce and operate tools for utilizing data.Support platform userEmergency handling includes trouble and maintenanceWork as a team. Improving team culture and working environment as a team memberDetailThis team mission is to build data platform to let Rakuten Ichiba and related business utilize data efficiently for maximizing data value. This team engineers are expected to build and operate big dataplatform for supporting business unit, and to build new system to change a situation of business. For that, members are required wide-range skills in software engineering, mind to trying new always, collaborate with coworker and work proactively.Related interview posthttps://commerce-engineer.rakuten.careers/entry/en/branch/0002Related presentation slidehttps://www.slideshare.net/rakutentech/ss-183353924Work EnvironmentTeam has 6 members as multi nationality. Additionally, members are required to collaborate with platform user in this job.Team member background includes Data Engineer, Web Application engineer, etc.Java, Scala, Ruby, Bash,Splunk, Grafana, Prometheus,Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Ranger,Ansible, Jenkins, OMGR,Kafka, Kafka Connect,Pants, Maven, Docker, KubernetesMandatory QualificationsObject oriented programming experienceUnix based development experienceBasic Hadoop technology and related productDesired QualificationsExpert Hadoop technology and related productFunctional Programming experienceRealtime data processingScala, Spark, KafkaOthers InformationAdditional information on LocationWe have 3 locations (Tokyo, Sendai, Fukuoka). You may choose the location which is most convenient for you.#engineer #jobcategory02 #applicationsengineer #jobsubcategory09 #commerce #organization01 #RakutenIchiba #servicename01 #Java #programminglanguage02 #Ruby #programminglanguage05LanguagesEnglish (Overall - 3 - Advanced)

title: データアナリスト・コンサルタント＜自社・地方銀行マーケットシェア40%のBIツール＞フルリモート可
description: 【企業名】 株式会社ダイナトレック 【職種名】 データアナリスト・コンサルタント＜自社・地方銀行マーケットシェア40%のBIツール＞フルリモート可 【仕事内容(概要)】 データアナリスト・コンサルタント＜自社・地方銀行マーケットシェア40%のBIツール＞フルリモート可 【具体的な仕事内容】 【自社開発・業界トップクラスのシェアを持つエンタープライズBI／地方銀行をはじめ官公庁や金融機関のDXに貢献／フルリモート可能】 昨今様々な業界でDX推進が行われていますが、DXのためにはまず現在までの膨大なデータを収集・統合し、活用できる形にする必要があります。とりわけ大企業や金融機関などは多くの部門・支店とそれぞれのデータ保存状況があり、データの集約自体にも多くの時間とコストがかかるという課題があります。 当社が1999年から一貫して提供している「DYNATREK」は、大組織で稼働する様々なシステムを「仮想データベース」という技術でメタデータレベルで統合し、その統合されたデータをユーザーが自在に分析できるようにするツールです。1984年に創業し、1991年から通商産業省における貿易保険システムの構築にかかわったシステムコンサルティング会社としての知見から、安価かつ短期間での導入が可能で、結果として地方銀行で40%のシェアとなっているほか、他業界からのニーズも多く、今後も安定的な拡大を見込んでいます。 ■業務内容：「DYNATREK」のデータアナリスト・コンサルタントとしてご活躍いただきます。 ・顧客の経営計画実現のためのロードマップをイメージ可能なプロトタイプの作成 ・DYNATREK製品機能を用いたBIインターフェースの作成 ・顧客で使われるビジネス用語の定義とデータベース定義のデータマップの作成 ・短期間でのプロジェクト目標達成のための資源采配 ※顧客ニーズを製品開発部門と連携し、製品の機能追加や変革も伴いながら顧客の課題解決を支える重要なポジションとなります。 ■使用技術： ・言語：javascript／データベース：oracle、postgresql、sql-server／その他：tomcat ・その他、現場で使われている技術…言語：java／フレームワーク：angular／ソースコード管理：git／情報共有ツール：chatwork ■チーム構成：従業員数に対するエンジニア比率67％（チームの性別比率：男性90％、女性10％） 【対象となる方(概要)】 学歴不問 【対象となる方(詳細)】 ＜応募資格/応募条件＞ ■必須要件： ・SQLおよびDBを駆使したプロジェクト参画経験 ・Powershell等を用いたバッチプログラムの作成経験 ・VBAを用いたエクセルマクロの作成経験 ■歓迎要件： ・エンドユーザーとの会話からニーズを引き出し、顧客満足につながる実装ができるヒューマンスキル ・大中堅企業向け業務システムを顧客へ納品し、安定稼働につなげた経験 【勤務地】 ＜勤務地詳細＞ 横浜事業所 住所：神奈川県横浜市西区みなとみらい2-3-1 クイーンズタワーA棟 受動喫煙対策：屋内全面禁煙 【アクセス】 ＜勤務地補足＞ 基本的にフルリモート、プロジェクト状況に応じて、週1~2程度客先での業務が発生することがございます。（直行直帰可） 遠隔地にお住まいの場合には、居住地近隣のお客様を任せる等、柔軟に対応予定です。 ＜転勤＞ 当面なし ＜在宅勤務・リモートワーク＞ 相談可（フルリモート・在宅） ＜オンライン面接＞ 可 【住所設定】 横浜事業所／神奈川県横浜市西区みなとみらい2-3-1 [最寄り駅]みなとみらい駅 【勤務時間】 ＜勤務時間＞ 9:30～18:30 （所定労働時間：8時間0分） 休憩時間：60分 時間外労働有無：有 【雇用形態】 正社員 【期間】 ＜雇用形態補足＞ 期間の定め：無 ＜試用期間＞ 6ヶ月 【給与】 ＜予定年収＞ 600万円～900万円 ＜賃金形態＞ 年俸制 ＜賃金内訳＞ 年額（基本給）：6,000,000円～9,000,000円 ＜月額＞ 428,571円～642,857円（14分割） ＜昇給有無＞ 有 ＜残業手当＞ 有 ＜給与補足＞ ※経験・能力を考慮の上決定していきます。 ■給与改定：年1回 記載金額は選考を通じて上下する可能性があります。 月給(月額)は固定手当を含みます。 【待遇・福利厚生 各種制度】 通勤手当、健康保険、厚生年金保険、雇用保険、労災保険 ＜各手当・制度補足＞ 通勤手当：通勤交通費支給（月3万円まで） 社会保険：補足事項なし ＜教育制度・資格補助補足＞ 各種補助あり ＜その他補足＞ ■育児介護休業（法定通り） ■契約保養施設利用時の社員優待 ■技術習得を目的とした書籍購入、講座受講支援金 ※その他、新しい制度を随時検討中です 【休日・休暇 その他】 完全週休2日制（休日は土日祝日） 年間有給休暇10日～（下限日数は、入社半年経過後の付与日数となります） 年間休日日数120日 年次有給休暇、慶弔休暇など 【事業概要】 ■概要 同社は、情報系システムの基盤となるデータベース統合製品を、自社開発・販売・サポートしています。 代表製品：「DynaTrek」「DynaBridge」 取り扱い製品：「Formtek Orion」（文書管理システム、米国製） 【郵便番号】 1060032 【所在地】 東京都港区六本木5-11-16 【ビル名等】 国際文化会館 【設立年 補足】 1999年12月 【従業員数】 20名 【市場】 非上場 【資本金】 30百万円 【売上高】 350百万円 【平均年齢】 33歳 【HPリンク先】 http://www.dynatrek.co.jp/ 【応募方法】

title: データエンジニア - 電機メーカー
description: ☑日系グローバル企業 ☑英語力が必要 ☑英語力不問 ☑リモートワーク可能 ☑フレックス勤務[ポジション]データエンジニア[事業内容・会社の特徴]日系老舗電機メーカー[仕事内容]【職務概要】全社横断で、以下業務を行って頂きます。サービスから得られるデータを活用した機械学習・予測モデルのロジックを構築、サービス・プロダクトへの活用画像、映像認識を研究し、サービス、プロダクトへの活用プロダクトやサービスを通して新規データ取得に関わるデータ設計、データマート構築支援、データ管理支援業務【業務詳細】全社、事業、サービスの課題に対してデータ分析、BIなどで解決するためのデータ分析基盤、BI構築と管理全社、事業に対するデータ利活用の推進データ専門組織としてデータ分析基盤に関わる提案、その業務推進とアウトプットへのコミットデータエンジニアの育成【部門業務特徴】全社を対象としたデータに関わる戦略、蓄積、分析、モニタリング、データビジネス活用に関する業務を行っています。主体性を持ち、臨機応変に粘り強く考え、自ら推進することができる方、データを専門としない相手にわかりやすく説明ができる方、実サービスにおける課題解決が好きな方、特定の技術にこだわらず、必要に応じて新たなスキルを自ら習得できる方、意見が異なる場合もプラスに捉え、人を巻き込み推進することができる方を求めています。【当求人の魅力】新設された組織のため、活動やカルチャーなど、これから創り出していく面白さがあります。また、経営層との距離が近いので声を届けやすく、風通しの良い職場です。[応募資格]【必要業務経験】SQL, Python, Spark等を用いた大規模データ処理を行った経験AWS、GCP、Azure等クラウドでのデータ分析基盤の構築した経験【歓迎する経験】Webアプリケーション、分散散システムの開発運用経験DBチューニングやSQL最適化などの経験BIツールの設計、構築、管理した経験（Tableau等）語学力：英語（TOEIC 600点程度）[語学力]英語力：歓迎Japanese Language level: Fluent - Native (Equivalent to JLPT N1)Work permission in Japan required[勤務地]東京都[勤務時間]９：００〜１７：４５(所定労働時間：７時間４５分)コアタイム：１０：００〜１５：００休憩時間：６０分[雇用形態]正社員 または 嘱託社員[給与]600〜750万円（スキル・ご経験により決定）[待遇・福利厚生]賞与：年２回(６月、１２月) ※正社員の場合【社会保険】完備（健康・厚生年金・雇用・労災）【福利厚生その他】在宅勤務制度、財形貯蓄制度、企業年金制度(確定拠出年金／確定給付企業年金)、団体保険、共済事業、等 ※正社員のみ[休日休暇]年間休日：１２５日年間有給休暇：２２日〜２５日休日休暇形態：土日祝日、夏期休暇、年末年始 ※その他会社カレンダーによる※ご興味をおもちいただけましたら、まずはエントリーをお願いいたします。ご紹介できる場合は、5営業日以内に担当コンサルタントよりご連絡いたします。詳細はその際に別途明示いたします。Reference: JO-2203-469426Seniority Level: Mid-Senior levelJob Function: Information Technology, Engineering, Other

title: データアナリスト/HRサービス（LINEスキマニ・LINEバイト）
description: 求人概要 / Role and Responsibility国内MAU最大級のPlatform力を活用して、世の中の多くの人の生活と人生をより豊かに変えていく。LINEでは2018年より「HRサービス事業部」を設立して、Life on LINEにおける「人材」領域のなかで、LINEならではの新たな仕事探し体験の創出を実現すべく積極的に事業を展開しています。当社のミッションである「CLOSING THE DISTANCE」の先に、HRサービス事業部が見据える世界は 「働くことやキャリアを通じて人生が豊かになる社会」。人と人、人と情報をつなげて、 心地よく快適な距離を作り出していく当社だからこそ提供できる、人と仕事との出会いがあると信じています。HRサービス事業部はLINEにおける「人材」サービス領域として、LINEならではの新たな仕事探し体験の創出を実現すべく、「LINEバイト」や新規サービス「LINEスキマニ」など積極的に事業を展開しています。世の中を変えたいという想いを胸に、スケールの大きいサービス成長を目指し、 周りと協力しながらOwnershipを持って自ら提案・実行して行きたい方にとてもフィットするポジションです。職場の雰囲気は明るくてお互いに助け合いながらも、 各自が自ら責任感を持って、ワクワクしながらチャレンジできる環境です。また、マネジメントの近くで業務に携わるため、経営の意思決定プロセスや経営陣の視点の考え方を身近に感じることができます。今回募集するポジションは「LINEバイト」のデータアナリストとして、データ分析の観点からサービスの成長に向けた課題解決を推進していただきます。ご志望によっては、データドリブンの視点から、プロダクトの企画やグロースハックにも積極的に関与していただくことも可能です。■業務内容・サービスのアクセスログの解析を中心とした、ユーザーの利用状況・動向の調査・分析、レポーティング・サービス全体・各種施策における効果測定、課題分析および効率改善・各種モニタリングに必要なBIダッシュボード作成・KPIの考案と予実管理・ユーザーデータを活用した企画立案・開発応募資格 / Qualifications■必須の経験・スキル・SQLを使ったデータ抽出・分析の経験(1年以上)・Google Analytics/Adobe Analytics/Tableau等を用いて、サービスの効果測定や効率改善を行った経験・BtoCのWebサービス、またはスマートフォンアプリにおけるユーザーデータ、行動ログなどの分析経験■歓迎する経験・スキル・大規模データベースからデータを抽出し、分析した経験・Python/R/SAS/SPSSなどのツールや言語を扱える方・BtoCのWebサービス、またはスマートフォンアプリの企画・ディレクション業務経験・インターネット関連企業における、社内データを活用したマーケティングの実務経験・データマイニング、統計解析、機械学習などいずれかの専門知識■求める人物像・物事を客観的に捉え、課題解決について最適な判断・提案・意見が積極的にできる方(問題解決能力が高い方)・サービスの成長と新たな価値提供を常に考えられる方・チャレンジングかつ変化が激しい環境を楽しめる方・高いオーナーシップ、当事者意識、責任感を持ち、自分がすべきことを探して実行に移す自律性のある方・関係者を巻き込みながらチームワークを意識して業務推進ができる方勤務地 / Location四谷オフィス〒160-0004 東京都新宿区四谷1-6-1四谷タワー23F雇用形態 / Employment type正社員勤務時間 / Working hours10:00～18:30(実働7時間30分)待遇・福利厚生 / Benefits■休日/休暇・週休2日制、年次有給休暇、慶弔休暇、リフレッシュ休暇制度（勤続5年で10日間）■給与・年俸制（保有されるスキル・経験・能力により優遇、相談の上で決定）・年俸の12分の1を毎月支給。・別途、インセンティブプラン有(※1)・給与改定：年2回・諸手当：交通費支給（会社規定による）、LINE Pay Card Benefit Plan(※2)(※1)年俸額の他に、会社・本人の業績、評価に応じ、年2回インセンティブを支給することがあります。（必ず支給されるものではありません。また、支給日に在籍している場合に限り支給対象となります。）(※2)社員の「健康維持増進」「自己啓発」「次世代育成」を目的として給与とは別に支給する手当です。■各種保険・雇用保険、労災保険、健康保険、厚生年金保険■福利厚生・定期健康診断・各種社内イベント他■受動喫煙防止措置の実施・屋内原則禁煙（屋内に喫煙室あり）・四谷オフィス、南新宿オフィス、大崎オフィス※当社はオフィス勤務と在宅勤務を組み合わせた、より効率的に高いパフォーマンスを発揮し続ける新しい働き方「LINE Hybrid Working Style」を採用しています。https://linecorp.com/ja/pr/news/ja/2021/3912その他詳細は面談の際にお伝えします。選考フロー / Interview Process■選考プロセス（1-1.5ヶ月を想定）書類選考→課題選考→面接2-3回→バックグラウンドチェック→オファー※課題選考・面接はオンラインにて実施します。

title: Data Engineer/Data Science Engineer - AI Success Supervisory Department (AISSD)
description: Job Description Business Overview Rakuten group has almost 100 million customer base in Japan and 1 billion globally as well, providing more than 70 services in a variety such as ecommerce, payment services, financial services, telecommunication, media, sports, etc.Department OverviewAI Success Supervisory Department (AISSD) provides data science initiatives by leveraging Rakuten group ’ s data. The department has international culture created by excellent employees joined around the world and provides the cutting-edge data science. Following the strategic vision “ Rakuten as a data-driven membership company ” , AISSD is expanding our data activities across our multiple Rakuten group companies. Position Details We Are Looking For a Data Engineer/Data Science Engineer To Work Within One Of The Following Departments Within Our AI Success Supervisory Department (AISSD) Data Science Consulting Department (DSCD) Analytics Data Engineering Department (ADED) Catalog Management Department (CAMD) Enterprise Consulting Department (ECD)Mandatory Qualifications Computer science or related background 5+ years’ experience in software development, especially using Python as a programming language Experience with common Linux commands and Linux scripting languages Experience with Hadoop, MapReduce, HDFS and Big Data querying tools, such as Tez, Hive, and Impala Experience with designing and building tools based on specific requirements Experience with building and maintaining data science platform Experience with SQL and some of the modern relational databasesDesired Qualifications Experiences in web service development in multiple industries. Solid knowledge of large volumes data processing Experience with Big Data ML toolkits, such as Mahout, SparkML , or H2O Experience with NoSQL databases, such as HBase, Redis, CouchBase Familiar with data mining concepts and machine learning algorithms Experience with Spark and stream-processing systems, using solutions such as Storm or Spark-Streaming Knowledge of various ETL techniques and frameworks, such as Flume#engineer#datascientist#researcher#technologyservicediv#Python

title: Customer Engineer, Data Analytics, Enterprise Data Application (Japanese)
description: Google welcomes people with disabilities.Minimum qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, related field, or equivalent practical experience.2 years of experience in customer-facing role (e.g., pre-sales engineer, consultant, professional services).Experience in data management Business Intelligence Application (e.g., Tableau, PowerBI), Data Processing (e.g. Informatica), or Analytics Platform (e.g., Hadoop/Spark, Netezza, Teradata).Ability to speak and write in Japanese fluently.Preferred qualifications:Master's degree in Computer Science, other technical fields or equivalent practical experience.Experience with application development and integration experience, with software integration with Web API.Experience supporting sales for enterprise as pre-sales engineer for wide portfolio of data lifecycle.Experience discussing the value of machine learning with customer.About The JobIn this role, you will work with Sales teams as a data analytics solutions subject matter expert to differentiate and paint the vision of Google Cloud to our customers. You will help prospective customers and partners understand the power of Google Cloud with translating technical value to business value, explaining technical features, helping customers design architectures, engage in proof of concepts, and troubleshoot potential roadblocks related to analytics workloads and projects. You will craft the vision to transform customer business with the power of data, using Google Cloud’s unique technology (e.g., BigQuery, Cloud Dataflow, Data Catalog etc.).ResponsibilitiesBuild a trusted advisory relationship with our customers, identify customer priorities, discover the needs of data powered innovation, create the story to transform customer’s business with using data, technical objections, and design strategies encompassing Google Cloud’s Data solutions to deliver business value and resolve blockers.Support the team which helps enterprise customers for their digitalization with Google Cloud, supporting bid response, product and solution briefing, proof-of-concept work, and the coordination of regional partners, focusing on translating technical value to business value.Make recommendations on integration strategies, enterprise architectures, platforms, and application infrastructure required to successfully implement a complete solution providing best practice advice to customers and partners to optimize Google Cloud effectiveness.Drive consumption for Google Cloud’s data products with value based discovery for our customers. Travel to customer sites and conferences, as needed.Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

title: 中国語を生かせるブリッジエンジニア
description: 東証一部上場大手通信会社のグループ企業|海外出身メンバーも多く、グローバルな環境で働いていただけます！About Our Client遠隔医療サービスの自社アプリを提供する大手通信サービス企業のグループ会社。大企業の基盤を活かしながら、安定した資金力、ビジネス構想力、ブランド力、IT技術を駆使し、マーケットをリードしていくことを目指しています。CTOや開発メンバーには海外出身者や中国語を話すメンバーがおり、また海外企業との連携も必要であるため英語や中国語を生かせるグローバルな環境です。Job Descriptionビジネスサイドからの要望を受け、イメージ画像や画面遷移図などを含めた仕様書を作成する作成ツールは confluence を利用仕様書に基づいて、海外パートナーのエンジニアとコミュニケーションをとるThe Successful Applicant1年以上の開発経験（言語不問）中国語（ビジネスレベル）日本語（ビジネスレベル）将来的にプロダクトマネージャーを目指す意欲がある方What's on Offer★フルリモート、フレックスタイム制★大手企業の安定した基盤のある中で通常のスタートアップよりも規模が非常に大きい事業に関与することができます！グループ会社である大手企業の福利厚生を受けることができます※詳しくはコンサルタントにお問い合わせくださいContact: Yuna HonjoQuote job ref: JN-032022-5290791

title: データサイエンティスト＜自動駐車、おもてなしサービス等＞
description: 【仕事内容】■CASE領域において、市場価値の高い製品・サービスを開発するためのAIを含む技術開発を担当していただきます。直近商用化する予定のものから、将来に向けての技術開発まで、様々な時間軸のプロジェクトが並行して走っています。以下いずれかのグループへの配属となります。・インカーグループ：車体領域への技術提供（車室内監視システムと連携した機能開発）・アウトカーグループ：走行領域への技術提供（走行制御システムと連携した機能開発）【具体的には】商品開発部門と協業し、以下のようなプロジェクトを担当いただきます。・「自動運転時代の新サービス：おもてなし」プロジェクト…AIを活用して車室内外の人の状態推定を行うことで、より快適な乗車を提供するシステムの研究・開発・「物体検知アルゴリズム開発」プロジェクト…自動運転に必要なディープラーニングを活用した高精度かつ軽量な物体検知モデルの開発・「自動緊急ブレーキ開発」プロジェクト…車両周辺の対象物(歩行者など)の正確な位置、移動方向・速度、行動などを把握するために必要な技術の開発・「自動バレー駐車開発」プロジェクト…ス...【求める人材】【必須要件】機械学習の知識を活用し、自ら課題解決をされたご経験【歓迎要件】・画像認識・画像処理・画像生成に関する知識・Deep learningのモデル構築～実装経験・センサー情報や時系列データを扱ったご経験【給与】500-1000万円【勤務地】福岡県【勤務時間】08:30 - 17:30（コアタイム：00:00 - 00:00）【雇用・契約形態】【待遇・福利厚生】健康保険、雇用保険、労災保険、厚生年金通勤手当、家賃補助（入居条件有）、家族手当寮社宅、持ち株会制度、財形貯蓄、社員食堂、個人年金など（従業員拠出）への補助、その他制度 保養所、会員制リゾート、契約スポーツ施設、社内託児所、確定拠出年金、アイシン企業年金基金、服装自由、在宅勤務可能、短時間勤務可能【休日・休暇】年間121日／（内訳）完全週休2日制（土・日）、春季休暇、夏期休暇、年末年始、有給休暇、慶弔休暇、リフレッシュ休暇、介護休暇、産休育休

title: Desenvolvedor Júnior
description: Na EY, você terá a chance de construir uma carreira tão única quanto você, com alcance global, cultura inclusiva e tecnologia para se tornar a melhor versão de você. E nós contamos com sua voz e perspectivas únicas para ajudar a EY a se tornar ainda melhor. Junte-se a nós e construa uma experiência excepcional para você e um mundo de negócios melhor para todos.A EY é sinônimo de serviços de inovação e um centro de excelência. A área de Tech Delivery apoia plataformas desde a estratégia até a operação do centro, considerando seu perfil regional, multissetorial, multitecnologia e multiespecialidade. Reunimos a América Latina para cocriar respostas inovadoras para resolver os problemas de negócios mais complexos dos clientes.Requisitos:Graduação em curso de nível superior na área de Tecnologia da Informação, ou conclusão de qualquer curso de nível superior acompanhado de certificado de curso de pós‐graduação (especialização, mestrado ou doutorado) na área de Tecnologia da Informação de, no mínimo, 360 horas.Para Perfil JuniorExperiência comprovada de 1 a 2 anos como Desenvolvedor, Analista de Sistemas ou cargo correlato.Conhecimento em uma das tecnologias:full stack Java, Python, .Net, React, Angular.Responsabilidades:Será responsável por executar as tarefas do backlog do produto respeitando a priorização definida pelo Product Owner (PO);Distribuição de tarefas priorizadas do backlog do produto entre os seus membros;Entrar em contato com a equipe responsável sempre que houver dúvidas acerca de tarefas a serem executadas e/ou quando for necessário obter feedback para produto de software desenvolvido;Participar de todas as reuniões convocadas pelo Facilitador;Descrever as histórias do usuário;Realizar a quebra das histórias priorizadas pelo Product Owner em atividades; Manter o quadro de tarefas atualizado;Desenvolver o produto/sistema. ESTAMOS CONSIDERANDO PROFISSIONAIS EM TODO TERRITÓRIO NACIONAL **O que procuramosPessoas talentosas e que consigam enxergar os desafios mais difíceis de nossos clientes de todas as perspectivas. Por isso, buscamos pessoas curiosas, apaixonadas pelo que fazem e com uma variedade de habilidades.O que nós oferecemosOferecemos um pacote de remuneração e benefícios competitivo no segmento, através do qual você será recompensado/a com base no seu desempenho. Além disso, oferecemosDesenvolvimento profissional com base em um extenso programa de treinamentos, coordenado pela EY University (EYU), eleita como uma das melhores universidades corporativas;Programa EY Badges - programa único e inovador de desenvolvimento, aprendizagem e reconhecimento, preparando profissionais de forma teórica e prática nas competências mais relevantes da atualidade;Ambiente de trabalho que oferece a flexibilidade necessária para o cumprimento dos objetivos profissionais e pessoais, incentivando uma cultura de trabalho focada em resultados. Quer se sentir desafiado/a, motivado/a e valorizado/a todos os dias? Inspirar mudanças e deixar um legado? Faça parte do time da EY e ajude-nos na construção de um mundo de negócios melhor!Sobre a EYComo líder global em serviços de Auditoria, Consultoria, Impostos, Estratégia e Transações, contratamos e desenvolvemos as pessoas mais apaixonadas em seu campo de atuação para ajudar a construir um mundo de trabalho melhor. Isso começa com uma cultura que acredita que oferecer treinamentos, oportunidades e liberdade criativa pode fazer com que cada profissional atinja o seu melhor. Assim, não importa quanto tempo permaneça, a experiência excepcional da EY dura a vida toda.A EY acredita na igualdade de oportunidades. Independentemente de gênero, idade, raça, cor, credo, orientação sexual e deficiência, todos os candidatos qualificados serão considerados em nossos processos.

Junte-se a nós e construa uma experiência excepcional para você e um mundo de negócios melhor para todos.A EY é sinônimo de serviços de inovação e um centro de excelência. A área de Tech Delivery apoia plataformas desde a estratégia até a operação do centro, considerando seu perfil regional, multissetorial, multitecnologia e multiespecialidade. Reunimos a América Latina para cocriar respostas inovadoras para resolver os problemas de negócios mais complexos dos clientes.Requisitos:Graduação em curso de nível superior na área de Tecnologia da Informação, ou conclusão de qualquer curso de nível superior acompanhado de certificado de curso de pós‐graduação (especialização, mestrado ou doutorado) na área de Tecnologia da Informação de, no mínimo, 360 horas.Para Perfil JuniorExperiência comprovada de 1 a 2 anos como Desenvolvedor, Analista de Sistemas ou cargo correlato.Conhecimento em uma das tecnologias:full stack Java, Python, .Net, React, Angular.Responsabilidades:Será responsável por executar as tarefas do backlog do produto respeitando a priorização definida pelo Product Owner (PO);Distribuição de tarefas priorizadas do backlog do produto entre os seus membros;Entrar em contato com a equipe responsável sempre que houver dúvidas acerca de tarefas a serem executadas e/ou quando for necessário obter feedback para produto de software desenvolvido;Participar de todas as reuniões convocadas pelo Facilitador;Descrever as histórias do usuário;Realizar a quebra das histórias priorizadas pelo Product Owner em atividades; Manter o quadro de tarefas atualizado;Desenvolver o produto/sistema. ESTAMOS CONSIDERANDO PROFISSIONAIS EM TODO TERRITÓRIO NACIONAL **O que procuramosPessoas talentosas e que consigam enxergar os desafios mais difíceis de nossos clientes de todas as perspectivas. Por isso, buscamos pessoas curiosas, apaixonadas pelo que fazem e com uma variedade de habilidades.O que nós oferecemosOferecemos um pacote de remuneração e benefícios competitivo no segmento, através do qual você será recompensado/a com base no seu desempenho. Além disso, oferecemosDesenvolvimento profissional com base em um extenso programa de treinamentos, coordenado pela EY University (EYU), eleita como uma das melhores universidades corporativas;Programa EY Badges - programa único e inovador de desenvolvimento, aprendizagem e reconhecimento, preparando profissionais de forma teórica e prática nas competências mais relevantes da atualidade;Ambiente de trabalho que oferece a flexibilidade necessária para o cumprimento dos objetivos profissionais e pessoais, incentivando uma cultura de trabalho focada em resultados. Quer se sentir desafiado/a, motivado/a e valorizado/a todos os dias? Inspirar mudanças e deixar um legado? Faça parte do time da EY e ajude-nos na construção de um mundo de negócios melhor!Sobre a EYComo líder global em serviços de Auditoria, Consultoria, Impostos, Estratégia e Transações, contratamos e desenvolvemos as pessoas mais apaixonadas em seu campo de atuação para ajudar a construir um mundo de trabalho melhor. Isso começa com uma cultura que acredita que oferecer treinamentos, oportunidades e liberdade criativa pode fazer com que cada profissional atinja o seu melhor. Assim, não importa quanto tempo permaneça, a experiência excepcional da EY dura a vida toda.A EY acredita na igualdade de oportunidades. Independentemente de gênero, idade, raça, cor, credo, orientação sexual e deficiência, todos os candidatos qualificados serão considerados em nossos processos.
